projects.title: Chess Edit Pro
projects.description: A private automation system that records online chess games using Puppeteer, processes game footage through a rendering pipeline, and generates short-form videos optimized for YouTube Shorts and Instagram Reels using FFmpeg. Automates capture, trimming, formatting, and export for social media publishing.

projects.title: Hey Birthday
projects.description: A web app that stores birthday information and shows whose birthday is coming up next. Lists can be shared and imported to other accounts.

projects.title: Tradebook
projects.description: A web application that allows users to track and manage their stock trades. Users can add, edit, and delete trade entries, view trade history, and analyze trading performance over time.

projects.title: paymeqr
projects.description: An npm package to generate UPI payment QR codes. Includes live demos for QR generation.

projects.title: ap-ssg
projects.description: A simple static site generator published as an npm package.

projects.title: easy-back-to-top
projects.description: A lightweight npm package that adds a smooth back-to-top button to websites. Distributed via jsDelivr CDN with over 12k yearly requests and around 5k monthly requests.

projects.title: ap-sitemap
projects.description: An npm package to generate sitemap.xml files programmatically for websites.

projects.title: PKG Stats Chrome Extension
projects.description: A Chrome extension that displays npm package statistics directly inside the browser.

projects.title: OG Viewer Chrome Extension
projects.description: A Chrome extension to preview Open Graph (OG) metadata of websites.
